block.dimdoors.orange_ancient_fabric: 橙色 變化的遠古構造
block.dimdoors.magenta_ancient_fabric: 洋紅色 變化的遠古構造
block.dimdoors.light_blue_ancient_fabric: 淺藍色 變化的遠古構造

block.dimdoors.lime_ancient_fabric: 淺綠色 變化的遠古構造

block.dimdoors.gray_ancient_fabric: 灰色 變化的遠古構造
block.dimdoors.silver_ancient_fabric: 淺灰色 變化的遠古構造
block.dimdoors.cyan_ancient_fabric: 青色 變化的遠古構造
block.dimdoors.purple_ancient_fabric: 紫色 變化的遠古構造
block.dimdoors.blue_ancient_fabric: 藍色 變化的遠古構造
block.dimdoors.brown_ancient_fabric: 棕色 變化的遠古構造

item.dimdoors.rift_stabilizer.info: 在裂痕的核心上使用以阻止其成長。
item.dimdoors.rift_stabilizer.stabilized: 裂痕已經穩定並且將停止增長
item.dimdoors.rift_blade.rift_miss: 您只能在裂痕的核心上使用該物品
item.dimdoors.iron_dimensional_door.info:
放在裂痕下方的方塊上 
來啟用裂痕 
或放在任意地點生成 
一個口袋次元。
item.dimdoors.gold_dimensional_door.info: 似於次元門 \n但它放在次元內部時 \n會保持次元的載入。
item.dimdoors.quartz_dimensional_door.in: 生成一個口袋次元的路徑
item.dimdoors.rift_blade.info: 在裂痕上開啟臨時的門 \n它還擁有瞬移攻擊的能力。
item.dimdoors.rift_remover.info: 在外露的裂痕附近使用 \n來移除它以及附近的 \n其他裂痕。
item.dimdoors.rift_signature.unbound.inf: 第一次點擊記錄一個位置; \n第二次點擊在兩地間創造 \n一對相互連接的裂痕。
第一次點擊記錄一個位置, \n其餘點擊生成連接 \n第一次和最後一次的兩地裂痕。
注意: 將會隨機傳送
item.dimdoors.oak_dimensional_door.info:
放在裂痕下方的方塊上 
來製造傳送門, 
放在口袋次元中 
以退出空間。
item.dimdoors.white_void_record.desc: White Void - The sound of Pocket
commands.fabricconvert.success: All fabric of reality has been converted to black.
commands.dimdoors.saveschem.success: 口袋 %s 已經成功地儲存。
commands.generic.dimdoors.not_in_pocket_: 您必須在口袋次元中才能使用此指令。
commands.generic.dimdoors.not_in_pocket: 您必須在口袋次元中，才能使用此指令。
commands.pocket.loadedSchem: Loaded schematic %s to clipboard. Paste it using //paste
rifts.destinations.escape.cannot_escape_: 不錯的嘗試，但你要麼死了要麼從靈薄獄找一些永恆構造出來。
rifts.destinations.escape.not_in_pocket_: 你只能用它從袖珍維度逃脫！
rifts.destinations.escape.did_not_use_ri: You didn't use a rift to enter the pocket dimension, so you ended up in Limbo!
rifts.destinations.escape.rift_has_close: The rift you used to enter the pocket dimension has closed and you ended up in Limbo!
rifts.destinations.private_pocket_exit.d: You didn't use a rift to enter the pocket dimension and you ended up in Limbo!
rifts.destinations.private_pocket_exit.r: The rift you used to enter the pocket dimension has closed and you ended up in Limbo!
rifts.entrances.rift_too_close: Placing a door this close to a tear in the world would be dangerous. Shift-right-click to place anyway, or place it on the rift's core (tesseract) to bind it to the rift.
rifts.entrances.cannot_be_placed_on_rift: This type of door can't be placed on a rift.
tools.rift_miss: 您只能在裂痕的核心上使用該物品
tools.signature_blocked: Usage of the signature was block
tools.target_became_block: Failed, there is now a block at the stored location
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.title: 次元門
The scale of the dispersion when escaping from a pocket or limbo, in blocks/depth. Limbo is treated as depth 50.
The speed at which rifts close when using the rift remover, in units of rift size per tick.
The speed at which rifts grow, in units of rift size per tick.
Distance in blocks to teleport the player in front of the dimensional door.
When true, shows the bounding boxes of floating rifts when the player is in creative.
The chance that an enderman spawns at a detached rift.
The chance that an enderman spawned by a detached rift attacks the closest player.
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.doors.cl: 如果為 ture，當玩家進入其門戶時，維度門將自動關閉。
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.doors.do: 為啟用/停用某些門設定重寫功能
啟用 - 只生成這些門的維度變體。停用 - 防止生成這些門的維度變體
一個門的方塊ID列表。如果門的物品ID與方塊的ID不同，也要加上。
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.doors.pl: 在創造模式下放置裂口
如果啟用，在創造模式下打破一扇門會產生一個裂口。
設定任何口袋維度中的所有口袋應相隔多少方塊。
設定任何口袋的最大大小。一個X的大小可以將口袋達到(x + 1) * (x + 1)個區塊。
設定新創建的私有口袋的最小大小。如果它被設定為大於 maxPocketSize(最大口袋大小) 的任何值，將使用 maxPocketSize(最小口袋大小) 的值來代替。
設定新創建的公共口袋的最小大小。如果它被設定為大於 maxPocketSize(最大口袋大小) 的任何值，將使用 maxPocketSize(最小口袋大小) 的值來代替。
Sets the equation to be used to compute weight when there is no / invalid weight equation present in the pocket generator json
Sets the fallback weight to be used if the default weight equation fails.
Default - Disabled but can be enabled, Default Enabled - Enabled but can be disabled, Always Enabled - Can not be disabled
Sets loading pockets to your WorldEdit clipboard asynchronous or synchronous. Only affects when WorldEdit is installed.
Can use Rift Signature in Private Pockets
If Enabled, rift signatures can be used within private pockets.
dimdoors.pocket.dyeAlreadyAbsorbed: The pocket is already that color, so the rift didn't absorb the dye.
dimdoors.pocket.remainingNeededDyes: The pocket has %s/%s of the dyes needed to be colored %s.
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.world.cl: Sets the chance (out of 1) that a cluster of rifts will generate in a given chunk.
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.world.ga: Sets the chance (out of 1) that a dimensional gateway will generate in a given chunk.
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.world.cl: Dimension Blacklist for the generation of Rift Scar clusters. Add a dimension ID here to prevent generation in certain dimensions.
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.world.ga: Dimension Blacklist for the generation of Dimensional Portal gateways. Add a dimension ID here to prevent generation in certain dimensions.
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.dungeons: The depth at which limbo is located. If a Rift reaches any deeper than this while searching for a new destination, the player trying to enter the Rift will be sent straight to Limbo.
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.monolith: 當這是真的， 靈薄獄的巨石會攻擊玩家， 並造成傷害。
When true, being exposed to the gaze of Monoliths for too long, will cause the player to be teleported to the void above Limbo.
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.limbo.un: 當設定為true，玩家在任何非口袋次元中死亡時（除了靈薄獄本身），也會被傳送到靈薄獄。 否則，玩家只要在口袋次元中死去，才會去靈薄獄 。
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.limbo.ha: 當設定為true，玩家死在靈薄獄將重生在靈薄獄，使用永恆流體或金製次元門是逃離靈薄獄唯一途徑。
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.player.f: Amount of fray needed for nameplate to glitch.
Amount of fray needed for screen to start having static
Amount of fray needed for your armor to start taking damage
text.autoconfig.dimdoors.option.graphics: How long, in milliseconds, the rift's core (tesseract animation) should be shown for when attempting to place a door near a large rift but not directly on it. Set to -1 to disable.
Set this to true to always show rifts' cores (tesseract animation).
Multiplier affecting how large rifts should be rendered, 1 being the default size.
Multiplier affecting how much rifts should jitter, 1 being the default size.
argument.dimdoors.schematic.invalidNames: Invalid schematic namespace. Expected one of %s, found %s.
dimdoors.advancement.lost_and_found.desc: Open a chest in a Dungeon
dimdoors.advancement.out_of_time.desc: Set your spawn point in a pocket dimension
limbo.death.fell.accident.ladder: %1$s 從梯子上跌下來，跌進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.accident.vines: %1$s 從藤蔓上跌下來，跌進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.accident.weeping_vines: %1$s 從垂泣藤上跌下來，跌進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.accident.twisting_vines: %1$s 從扭曲藤上跌下來，跌進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.accident.scaffolding: %1$s 從鷹架上跌下來，跌進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.accident.other_climbabl: %1$s 攀登時跌落，跌進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.accident.generic: %1$s 從高處摔下，摔進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.killer: %1$s 注定要會跌倒，跌進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.assist: %1$s 注定會被%2$s用跌倒，跌進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.assist.item: %1$s was doomed to fall by %2$s using %3$s and fell into limb
limbo.death.fell.finish: %1$s 跌得太遠，被 %2$s送進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.fell.finish.item: %1$s 跌得太遠， 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 送入了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.lightningBolt: %1$s 被閃電擊中，並送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.lightningBolt.player: %1$s 在戰鬥 %2$s 時被閃電擊中， 送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.inFire.player: %1$s 在和 %2$s 戰鬥時起火，被送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.onFire.player: %1$s 在和 %2$s 戰鬥時被火焰燒成灰燼，被送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.lava: %1$s 試圖在熔岩中游泳，直接沉入靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.lava.player: %1$s 跳入熔岩試圖逃離 %2$s 的追殺，而逃到靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.hotFloor: %1$s 察覺地面是片熔岩，還能潛入靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.hotFloor.player: %1$s 因為 %2$s 而走進了危險地帶，最終到達靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.inWall: %1$s 在牆壁裡找到了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.inWall.player: %1$s 在與 %2$s 戰鬥時 卡進牆裡找到了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.drown.player: %1$s 潛入水中試圖逃離 %2$s 的追殺，而逃到靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.starve.player: %1$s 在戰鬥 %2$s 時餓到了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.cactus.player: %1$s 在試圖逃離 %2$s 時被仙人掌刺送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.magic.player: %1$s 在試圖逃離 %2$s的魔法時，被送進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.even_more_magic: %1$s 被連續魔法送到靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.message_too_long: Actually, message was too long to deliver fully. Sorry! Here's stripped version: %s
limbo.death.attack.wither.player: %1$s 在與 %2$s 戰鬥時凋零進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.witherSkull: %1$s 被 %2$s 發射的頭顱射進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.anvil: %1$s 被墜落下來的鐵砧壓進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.anvil.player: %1$s 在與 %2$s 戰鬥時被落下的鐵砧壓進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fallingBlock: %1$s 被墜落下來的方塊壓進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fallingBlock.player: %1$s 在與 %2$s 戰鬥時被落下的方塊壓進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.stalagmite.player: %1$s 在與 %2$s 戰鬥時被石筍刺入靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fallingStalactite: %1$s 被落下的鐘乳石砸進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fallingStalactite.pla: %1$s 在與 %2$s 戰鬥中被落下的鐘乳石砸進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.mob: %1$s 被 %2$s 殺害，送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.mob.item: %1$s 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 殺害， 送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.player: %1$s 被 %2$s 殺害，送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.player.item: %1$s 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 殺害， 送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.arrow: %1$s 被 %2$s 射殺，被送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.arrow.item: %1$s 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 射殺， 被送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fireball: %1$s 被 %2$s 的火球送往了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fireball.item: %1$s 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 打出的火球送往了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.thrown: %1$s 被 %2$s 活生生揍到靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.thrown.item: %1$s 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 揍到了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.indirectMagic: %1$s 被 %2$s 用魔法殺害，並送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.indirectMagic.item: %1$s 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.thorns: %1$s 試圖襲擊 %2$s 時被反送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.thorns.item: %1$s 試圖用%3$s襲擊 %2$s 時被反送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.trident.item: %1$s 被 %2$s 用 %3$s 刺進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fall: %1$s 在堅硬的地上撞出了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fall.player: %1$s 在試圖逃離 %2$s 時在堅硬的地上撞出了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.outOfWorld.player: %1$s 不想和 %2$s 活在同一個世界，而進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.dragonBreath: %1$s 被龍之吐息烤進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.dragonBreath.player: %1$s 被 %2$s 的龍之吐息烤進了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.flyIntoWall: %1$s 體驗了動能，進入了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.flyIntoWall.player: %1$s 試圖逃離 %2$s 時體驗了動能，進入了進靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fireworks: %1$s 在爆炸中進入了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fireworks.player: %1$s 在與 %2$s 戰鬥時 隨著爆炸進入了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.fireworks.item: %1$s 在 %2$s 用 %3$s 發射的煙火所產生的爆炸中進入了靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.badRespawnPoint.messa: %1$s 被 %2$s 擊斃，送往靈薄獄
limbo.death.attack.sweetBerryBush.player: %1$s poked a hole in reality whilst trying to escape %2$s
limbo.death.attack.sting.player: %1$s 借由%2$s聽到了靈薄獄的聲音
